title: What does Greece look like? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ll try to translate a Greek joke in English as best as I can and you can draw your own conclusions. When God created the world he told all the people to come to his office from 8 o’clock in the morning till 5 o’clock in the afternoon to allocate them their lands. Right on time at 8 o’clock sharp the English was first online followed by the German and etc and etc. By 5 o’clock in the afternoon, everyone passed by God’s office and got land. All except the Greek. At around 10 o’clock there was a knock on God’s door. He opens it and there in front of him, the greek was standing. the following conversation ensued. G Yes. Oh..its you. You are late. I gave all the lands. None is left. Gr. Hey Boss I know I am late but there must something you can give me. G. You should have come on time. Gr. But I woke up late. G. Why? Gr. You know…I had a late night at the bouzouki and couldn’t wake up in time. G. I don’t care. Go away. Gr. Wait a minute Boss. Is not my fault. G. What do you mean is not your fault. Gr. No. Is no my fault. It's yours. G. Mine? Gr. Yes! Yours. You know me better than anyone else. You made me like this. After a lot of deliberation, God said. Ok. Look there is a piece of LAND on earth which I reserved for my self. Is not very big. Is very rocky and is surrounded on three sides by the sea. From ALL my children you are the shiftiest, the most irresponsible and the most undisciplined. But you are the kindest, the brightest and deep down you love most so I’ll let have it. A Land reserved for GODS. What about this. Hope you like it and no offense to my brothers.
